About Oumi’s Corner

This is a personal blog by Oumaima Zerouali, sharing thoughtful reflections on software development.

Topics Covered

  • Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular
  • DevOps and Cloud technologies
  • Software development practices
  • Personal reflections on the developer journey

About the Author

I’m a software developer passionate about learning and sharing knowledge. Through this blog, I aim to document my journey and insights in the world of software development.

Connect

Find me on LinkedIn, GitHub, and Instagram.
